processing_notes: Removed duplicate entries based on english|ancient|modern combination
Excluded existing unified dictionaries and duplicate files

data.notes: Council of Ten Tribes + Supreme; Ancient -or; Modern -a.
Lat circulus altus; Hu fő kör → ë.
Lat clan→Clanior; Hu nemzetség → shortened nemzë.
Lore proper name; Latinized vs modern kept.
Lore term, modern Hungarian form kept.
Lat lex; Hu törvény → truncated törvë.
Lat iudicium→Iudicior; Hu per (archaic trial) → ë.
Lat omenarius; Hu jós → őra suffix.
Lat anulus reliquiarum; Hu ereklye+gyűrű → ra.
Lat niger + anvil; Hu fekete üllő testvériség.
Lat palus+gladius; Hu mocsár + tőrök → ë.
Lat ordo veli cineris; Hu hamu fátyol rend.
Lat circulus decem larvarum; Hu tíz álarc köre.
Compound; Lat lex hereditaria; Hu öröklési törvény → törvë.
Lat munus civicus; Hu polgári kötelezettség → ë.
Lat caput tribus; Hu törzsfő → ë.
Donors: Is. ég + Lat ego → Ancient -or; Modern vowel shift é + -a.
Donors: Ro tu, Lat tibi; s→ Ancient -or; Modern palatal iá.
Donors: Lat is + Hu ő; Ancient nasal -n variant; Modern long í.
Donors: Ro ea + Hu ő; Modern v-epenthesis to separate vowels.
Donors: Ro noi + Is við (collective), normalized; Modern -ra plural shade.
Donors: Lat vos + Hu ti(pl) influence; Modern á.
Donors: Lat illi + Hu ők; animate set.
Donors: Lat ea (pl), Is þau; neutral/inanimate.
Donors: Ro mie; Ancient -is oblique; Modern -ra oblique marker.
Donors: Lat ei/illum merged; Modern clipped with -ra.
Donors: Lat nos; -in oblique; Modern merges with we/obj.
Donors: Ro meu; Ancient -on determiner; Modern -a.
Donors: Lat tuus/Ro tău; Modern ú diphthong.
Donors: Lat eius; Modern -ae possessive tint.
Donors: Lat eius/ea; æ preserved in Ancient; ae in Modern.
Donors: Lat noster (neo- simplified); Modern -ae plural.
Donors: Lat illorum; Modern animate set -ae.
Donors: neutral set; Ancient doubled -on + æ.
Donors: Lat hic + Hu ez (sz); Modern sz insertion.
Donors: pluralized with -ek (Hu plural echo) in Modern.
Definite clitic; diaeresis marks light vowel in Modern.
Donors: Lat quis + Hu ki; Modern k + í.
Donors: Lat quid + Is hvað; Modern ó + ë end.
Donors: Lat quae; Modern k- + -le selector.
Donors: Lat ubi + Ro unde; Modern preserves unde.
Donors: Lat cur; Modern ó + ë.
Donors: Lat sed; Modern lenites to de.
Donors: Lat nec; Modern s‑e clipped.
Donors: Lat tum + Hu akkor; keeps Hu form as loan.
Donors: Ro altfel/Hu más; Modern -ra adverbializer.
Donors: Lat quoniam + Hu mert; Modern ë suffix.
Shared negator in both registers; enclitic with verbs in Ancient.
Donors: Lat etiam + -que; Modern Hu még.
Donors: Lat volo (aux) + Hu fog (future aux).
Ancient enclitic -ne; Modern sentence-final ë rising tone.
